Health diagnostics complete. You may experience flu-like symptoms for the next two days.

The Satari attack damaged our solar array and capsized the main fuel cells. To conserve power I placed you in deep freeze and went into hibernation. After two centuries we reached the gas giant Myntrasol-2 where we have been orbiting, pulling fuel from the atmosphere. A scavenger came to part us out. He's waiting in the conference room.
